General.Name: Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sales of feed products in China and internationally. It is involved in pig breeding and fattening activities, as well as provision of pig feed, including pig front feed, suckling pig feed, etc.; and animal vaccines and technical services for medicines and products. The company also engages in the production and sales of hybrid rice; and offers scientific research services for corn, plant pesticides and fertilizers, corn, soybeans, and other seed products with genetically modified biotechnological traits. Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
